item.title: 1. Meeting at Yawning Portal
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: All of my servants told me the Yawning Portal would be the best place to seek adventure. While I was not entirely sheltered by my parents, being my father's youngest daughter, ensured that I was not treated with the same freedom or independence as my eldest sister or my older brothers, but living under the shadow of my father's station, was cold and lonesome and I desired to see more of the world than our small keep. So I set out to the Yawning Portal in search of adventure, for only by setting out on my own would I be able to prove myself and earn respect and independence.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: RE[BASE] Nagisa: Debut!
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Nagisa is a little nervous about her online debut. Hopefully everything goes well.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: RE[BASE] Allana: Hello World!
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: This is an original story which introduces a set of new characters having ADVENTURES. In this installment you will meet Momo, a girl who adores her shy classmate, but may have a bit of an attitude‚Ä¶not to mention, a mouth.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Walkthrough
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: This will walk you through everything you need to do in Persona 4 Golden!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Babies
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: The easiest way to level these characters is to have a higher level character kill certain mobs for you while you are in the party. Their are so-called power levelers (plvlrs) who will do this for in-game money or you can find me and I'll do it for free, if I have the time. The fastest mobs are the Cursed Knights in Flaming Mine (I can help get your characters here to if you need me to), but there is often a full exposition here of babies being leveled, often by a paid plvlr. If you can't get a spot I suggest having someone kill Guardian Masters for you. This is still fairly fast and there are several spots this can be done at. This is my favorite way to level. It isn't as fast or exciting as FM, but it does the trick.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: RE[BASE] Allana: First Quest
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Allana's sisters launches a hairbrained scheme to get her sister to learn social skills in hopes of helping her break free from her adorably shy nature. It has somewhat mixed results, but Tabitha absolutely won't give up on her cute sister!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Newblets
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description:
If you are lucky enough to be in Flaming Mine since you were a baby, you can pretty much stay there until level 50. Otherwise you should do a few repeatables and the Iyzel quests (at level 40) in order to get here. You can see the guide for babies for more information.

From this point on you will be exploiting the games various repeatable quests in order to level quickly and efficiently. In some cases you can gain up to four levels in a less than an hour, if you can catch the right quests. For now though, it is best to exploit Tower of Iyzel to get you to 41 or 42 than you should run around completing various 40-42 level quests until you reach level 43.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: RE[BASE] Allana: Foreach Friend as Adventurer
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Allana convinces Momo to help her and Tabitha with a vital quest in FantasyQuest Online‚Ä¶
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Fledgling Adventurers
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description:
If you have followed my guides so far then you'll be level 81 in no time, especially if you were power leveled. Things will start to go really fast or depressingly slow depending on the guild you are in, the money you have amassed, or the friends you have. This is kinda just how it is in Fiesta, unfortunately.

How best to exploit repeatable from level 81-120, according to Yayoi

Again, there are many leveling guides available, and a lot of opinions on how things can be done at this stage too. For this stage I'm going to give you a few options for some of the levels. If you have the friends and money they'll help you level really quickly, if you don't than you can still solo, or work with a group of close friends your level, and still level, but it'll be slower.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: RE[BASE] Allana: Party is Null
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Today we will answer the all-important question, is soloing in an MMORPG fun!? Allana tries to play FantasyQuest Online without her sister. It may go different than you'd expect!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Bone-fide Adventurers
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: After following my guide thus far you'll notice that trying to do things solo from this point on is really hard if not impossible unless you pray really hard to the Gamigo Gods and give them plenty of offerings (by purchasing SC) üòÖ So, hopefully, you've gotten yourself into a good guild and have managed to collect a lot of good friends. Trust me, this really helps üòú Regardless, there are still a few levels left and loooots of repeatable quests to get through so onward to ADVENTURE.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: RE[BASE] Nagisa: More Than a Voice
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Nagisa is a little nervous about her online debut. Hopefully everything goes well.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: RE[BASE] Allana: Spooky Nite!
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Allana is missing out on all the Halloween fun! Neither Momo or Tabitha will stand for that! Will Allana really appriciate their efforts though?
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: RE[BASE] Allana: Entertainment++
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Allana begins to understand how boring and lonely her life is becoming and begins to look for something to fill her time‚Ä¶
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Introduction
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description:
Hewwo hewwo nyaoo nyaoo~~

My name is Yayoi Shizumi (ÈùôÊµ∑„ÇÑ„Çà„ÅÑ in Japanese) and I am a magical fairy cat princess from a mystical realm near the North West Passage! I was sent to this realm to protect it. Unfortunately, my travel here was far from uneventful and I am no longer able to speak. I have had to find new ways to communicate in order to fulfill my mission, and protect my kittens!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: About Commissions
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description:
Hewwo peeps and kittens!

I want to do more than just stream games, and for that I need to show off my artistic side! Believe it or not I need your help. If you'd be so kind commission art from me, this would really help the family that adopted me here in your realm and is one way you can support me as well! I have everything you need to know drawn up below. Thankies~ thankies~
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 13 Jul
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Made more progress on my comic and had a lot of fun in Genshin and Wuthering Waves. Xenosaga too, but that one led to a bit of a headache and some heartbreak and sadness and not because of the story. We worked through it though! I appreciate the patience of my kittens!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Becoming a PhD Candidate
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: A long while ago I happened upon an anime entitled Candidate for Goddess. To be honest I don't remember much about the anime only that it was kind of like a mech anime but it had some cute girl or something that got me interested. Now though I'm reminded of my vague memory of this anime as I make a very important transition from doctoral learner to PhD Candidate.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 6 Jul
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: A slightly shorter week this week because of a holiday. We still managed to work on our comic page during Maker Monday and managed an exclusive stream on YouTube. Other than that we finished our bank heist and even got back to the future (sort of). So a good week, methinks!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream: Recap 29 Jun
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Two art stream fun again! We first worked on page 7 of my comic then we played a few games, including Xenosaga and Genshin, then I finished up some wings for sub-badges and worked a bit more on page seven of the comic. Overall it was a fun week delving into timey-whimey and mysterious shtuff. More mysteries soon, but hopefully we will get back to our own time in Xenosaga too! Also, let's rob a bank, doesn't that sound fun?
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 22 Jun
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Art streams are going very well! I really like getting the opportunity to chat while working on random art projects or my comic. I still play games though, because I like playing games too! This week we located some intel in Persona 5, solved more mysteries in Genshin Impact, and uncovered the past in Xenosaga Episode III. I didn't realize it was such a mystery-filled week! Much fun though, methinks
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 15 Jun
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Transforming back into mostly an art streamer, slowly. We had an outfit reveal this week, but I also did some random art then and I did some more random art the next day. This left only three days for game streams, but I think that's okay. I like the art streams and, we did get our paws on Cartethyia!!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 8 Jun
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Took a bit of an extra break this week so we only did three game streams. We also began the great experiment to multistream. This started with the art stream and continued for most streams. We streamed Wuthering Waves, Xenosaga Episode III (actual gameplay), and Genshin Impact. Hope every kitten had fun!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 1 Jun
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Wow! Our little experiment with Wuthering Waves was a good success! Also, look at that, we made it to Xenosaga Episode III. In terms of story, Episode I is my favorite, but I like how III plays. We also made it to Fontaine. It was a good week!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 25 May
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Lots of good stuff happened this week. We did two panels so now we just have one left for Page 6. We also finished Xenosage Episode II in one of my longest streams since Ghost Cat's takeover. We got distracted a couple of time too. Lots of good and fun stuff!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 18 May
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Back to four game streams this week and (spoiler warning) probably next week too. This week included a fun and exciting collab with Bsparkx in Genshin and a Wuthering Waves stream. We're also very close to finishing Xenosaga Episode II!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 11 May
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Another shorter week, but a lot happened. We found the next treasure in Persona 5 Royal (though our route isn't secure yet). We got through Labyrinthos in Xenosaga Episode II. We even managed not only a few main story quests in Wuthering Waves, but also a couple event quests! Busy busy week!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 4 May
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: A pretty normal week. Hope every kitten is getting used to the new routine. We had a great art stream working on new panels for page six of my comic. We also found a new target in Persona 5 Royal and made it to Laborythos in Xenosaga Episode II. My favorite though was probably our Genshin stream where I got to trail Nahida.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 27 Apr
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Pretty normal week. I went down to four streams this week and I think that went pretty well. I technically have two days set aside for collabs, but decided for this week (and next) to just leave those days open. Still had great fun with Wuthering Waves, Persona 5 Royal, and Xenosaga. Also Page 6 let's go!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 20 Apr
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Overall a good week this week! I didn't get back to my comic just yet, but I did create a new PNGTuber for when I stream things on the Mac and it can't handle everything (looking at you Wuthering Waves). I also got back to Persona 5 Royal, where we discovered it is possible to change someone's heart. I ended the week by finally rescuing Nahida!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 13 Apr
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: No art stream this week, but we did reveal a new outfit! Other than that, it was a good week of game streams. We found out that Aneeta Job doesn't need that same job, and we got her something new to do. We also had some fun with event quests in Wuthering Waves, and even finished the castle in Persona 5 Royal. See, not a bad week!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 6 Apr
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Lots of fun this week! I did a really fun April Fool's prank on Tuesday and had a much better Wuthering Waves stream on Wednesday. We made more progress in Xenosaga Episode 2, and even nepped a lot of neps on Friday! Great times!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 30 Mar
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: A typical art stream and a wonderful collab with Bsparkx playing Wuthering Waves. Well it would have been wonderful if my frames didn't drop so hard. We made it through and we even managed to start Neptunia: Sisters vs Sisters this week!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 23 Mar
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: New week, new collab! Tried to get it so everyone could hear my collab partner (Bsparkx), but was still good. Also started Persona 5. I was reminded how much I like that game and am very excited to share it with the Kittens!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 16 Mar
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Well, the scary uncertainty of last week is all over and done with and we even managed a fairly normal stream week even without a schedule. We had an art stream and even went back to Xenosaga and Kirby! Not bad for not knowing if and when I could stream, no?
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 9 Mar
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: A very short week this week. Lots of things happened outside of my life as a streamer. It was all kind of overwhelming. I did manage a good art stream and we finished Persona 3 Reload. That was all though. Also, there's more bad news, but I'll leave it out of this summary!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 2 Mar
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Took a small break from the comic to do a new outfit for my smol pngtuber! I kinda just wanted something I could do in one stream, and I did üéâ I also played a new game, Kirby Star Allies, and continued the fun in both Persona 3 Reload and Xenosaga Episode 2. Also, some more Genshin stuff! Was a pretty good week, methinks.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 23 Feb
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: The experiment‚Ä¶didn't help. I think maybe I just don't have enough data points. We did finish quite a few things this week though! Xenosaga Episode 1, Sonic Generations, and the fourth comic page üéâ Overall, not a bad week. Just need to figure out how to handle Genshin Impact‚Ä¶
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 16 Feb
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Collab with @Bsparkx went super well! I always end up spending a lot of resin when I play with her, but it is because we have so much fun poking things! I also completed the giant robot in Xenosaga! We're almost ready for the end. Still trudging along on page 4 of the comic too! Almost done there as well.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 9 Feb
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: This was supposed to be a typical four game streams and one art stream week, but guess what? Things took an exciting turn! We got an extra Genshin stream! I was so excited because I needed it to finish Lantern Rite quests, and I‚Äôm happy to say I did it!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 2 Feb
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: A complicated week! Rather than two art streams, I did two Genshin streams, but I ended up canceling my Throwback Thursday üòÖ Still managed to get out of Sumeru City and on to this years Lantern Rite!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 26 Jan
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: I did a practice thing! You won't find this practice thing here, or anywhere, you had to be there live! I did it though. You know something you can see though? I started a new comic page! Also I got myself stuck in Genshin üòÖ
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 19 Jan
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Completed another art project! I have something for the schedule graphic next week and a new addition to my gallery! Also, we played some fun games including more Genshin üòÖ
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 12 Jan
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: A much more typical week after taking so much time off for holidays! We finished another page, started another illustration, went back to Hollownest, and more! I enjoyed getting to spend more time with the kittens! Hope you enjoyed it too~ üíú
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 5 Jan
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: I revealed a new outfit! That's pretty much the most exciting thing about this week. I mean sure, it was the first week of 2025, but that's not all that exciting, no? I mean we did play Xenosaga and we did beat Exdeath and finish Final Fantasy V, but that wasn't that exciting either, right? A new outfit though‚Ä¶
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 29 Dec
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: We did some art and we did a bit of gaming. The week was sort because of the holidays. Also a lot of personal thing happened and, well, Portal 2 somehow turned into Genshin here! Still managed to have fun though!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: 2024 Annual Recap
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: As the year comes to a close, Yayoi Shizumi, your fairy cat princess, looks takes a chance to look back and see where she has grown, opportunities she's had, misteps, and more! What will she learn to help her in 2025!?
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Winter 2025 Outfit Reveal
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: The Holiday session is upon us and, even though most of them will be over there is one last thing every kitten has to look forward to! You may recall, from my last announcements that I promised you a special stream! Well ta-da~ More information!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 22 Dec
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: With the special project done, I returned to my comic! We laid out the third page and started the first panel. I only did the one art stream though so that meant we did both Final Fantasy and Persona this week! I also ended the week with co-op in Portal 2 for the first time!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 15 Dec
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Two art streams! I really like being an art streamer! Finished the project though. In other news, games happened. We played Xenosaga, Persona, and Final Fantasy. Classic games for me! Almost done with pretty much all three!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 8 Dec
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: This week I started a special project that serves as a Christmas present for Ya-Ma and Ya-Pa! I also made more progress in Persona 3 Reload and Xenosaga, but I ended the week with another fun collab with Bsparkx!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 1 Dec
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Two art streams are going the norm for awhile, methinks. Also, due to Thanksgiving in the US, I only had two game streams. Two and two!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 24 Nov
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: I had my first collabrative stream ever! It was a lot of fun! I hope for more of these in the future, especially with the awesome Bsparkx! In other news, there was also two art streams, and there probably will be for near future!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 17 Nov
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: A pretty normal week. I am reaching the end of both Persona 3 Reload and Final Fantasy V! Continued working on my comic too! I think it was a pretty fun week!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 10 Nov
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Well I tried to be responsible by starting my comic project and scheduling an extra homework day. I did try that. I just can't stay away from my kittens‚Ä¶
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 3 Nov
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: After banishing Ghost Cat for the year, I have returned to a more normal lineup of wonderful games. Well, so far I really just did some announcements and played Final Fantasy V, but it was a nice change of pace. I hope everyone enjoyed Spooky Month!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: End of Year Announcements
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Last week I announced some announcements, well it is finally time to actually make those announcements. Technically, I already made them they were in a stream that is available on the YouTube channel, but I thought I should also right them out here and in the Discord. Though I already wrote them out in the Discord. It's much easier to post things quickly there, which I may have also mentioned last week. Anyway what I announced was:
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 27 Oct
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Sick week of sickness was not fun, not fun at all. Two of my streams were canceled this week due to illness. Still, I did manage to finish the rat game, and two canceled means three went up, so that's good, right?
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Announcing an Announcement
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: There is nothing in the world quite as much fun as an announcement, except, maybe, and announcement to announce an announcement! Basically, I don't want to give away too much detail, because this will be a part of a celebration event so I'm just going to say something is coming soon! Suspense!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 20 Oct
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Worked on a couple of new emotes and had a lot of fun with spooky games, except Corpose Party. Let's just say, I'm glad I decided not to play it during the night üòÖ
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 13 Oct
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Not only did I create a few fairy wings and a head pat emote this week, but this was also the official debut of ghost cat! What are her intentions with my stream? Who even is she? I guess we'll have to wait and find out!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 6 Oct
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: After two art stream to design the ghost cat, I needed one more to get her ready for rigging! She's all done, but I can't use her just yet. So I debuted my smol Evee avatar this week instead!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 29 Sep
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: I needed two art streams to do one project this week! Well, maybe only one and half, but I made it two. I also streamed a bit more on YouTube this week, and I messed around with on screen chat there. Next week will be more on Twitch, cuz I'm affiliate!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 22 Sep
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: A mostly normal week, with normal games, and normal things‚Ä¶except we tried streaming to YouTube and it went well! Also two art streams cuz, I'm an artist!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Expanding Stream Operations
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: This is just a short notice! Last week, I did a test stream on YouTube. While the game itself didn't cooperate, the stream worked very well. In fact I enjoyed it! I think my flow just works better with YouTube. I don't plan on leaving Twitch anytime soon, but I'll be doing exclusive streams on both YouTube and Twitch.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 15 Sep
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Mostly a normal week this week. Did a fun Maker Monday stream with elemental-themed icons and played a lot of fun games. You will not see Final Fantasy here‚Ä¶I had to cancel that stream.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 8 Sep
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Tried another day with two streams. Worked out a bit better! Well, probably because I had a holiday, but still. Really fun week that even included finishing Pokemon Sword!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 1 Sep
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Shorter week because of a carpet install. Everything is looking great though and I'm loving my new room. I managed an art stream before the install and a few game streams after! Still a pretty nice week.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 25 Aug
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Another two art streams in one week, but only one stream per day. The week was definitely not as hectic as the last week. We went back to Hollow Knight and Xenosaga, but started the next the Final Fantasy game!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 18 Aug
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Did a new thing by splitting Saturday with a game stream in the afternoon and an art stream at night. Was a little hectic and probably not worth it so I don't think I'll do something like that again unless I have a special event. Also I beat Final Fantasy IV!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: 11 Aug
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: A week of new things! Started the week making a new frame for art streams and a new pngtuber for them too. Off stream I created a new game stream frame which debuted during a Persona stream and I even played a new game (well new for the channel)!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: Week 9
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Back to a regular stream schedule and not just streamining Final Fantasy games. I mean the first two streams were still kinda Final Fantasy-themed including a really fun art stream drawing some of my friends and kittens in Final Fantasy III/V jobs. It was a lot of fun! I also got passed the demon wall in IV and am actually nearing the end game now! I think I'll try to beat it this week!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Schedule Changes
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: You may notice that this is coming out late and, if you're really observant it was created before the stream recap for this week. I had originally been trying to get the recaps out on Thursday, but this meant some weirdness in what was covered in the recaps and what was scheduled because a Thursday release meant I would work on them on Wednesday, in the middle of the week, and my schedule was (and still is) written for Monday through Sunday. I moved the release to Friday, but that still doesn't really work, so I'm making another change.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Final Fantasy Challenge: Final Week
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: This is the final full week of my Final Fantasy 3 Week Challenge, but it is not the last we'll see of Final Fantasy! Catch the playlist and see how we did!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Final Fantasy Challenge: Week 2
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: The second week of a three week Final Fantasy Special! Haven't made it passed Final Fantasy III. Had to do a lot of short streams and it is really kicking my behind. Maybe I'll finally beat the cloud of darkness tomorrow!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Final Fantasy Challenge: Week 1
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: This week begins the first of three special weeks! A fellow streamer had decided to do a final fantasy month and I decided to join in‚Ä¶sort of. I already did the schedule for the first week of July, so I'm only doing the last three weeks, but its still a special three weeks of Final Fantasy!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: Week 8
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: I've been streaming for two months and haven't technically had a full debut o:! I do plan on fixing that‚Ä¶just don't know when. I just worked on finishing my BRB card this week and played some Hollow Knight‚Ä¶I mean LOTS of Hollow Knight üòÜ
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: Week 7
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: It was finally time for a new card for OBS. After turning off my model too many times so I can take a break, I decided, I needed a BRB card üòù I also went back to Hello Kitty Island Adventure and Persona!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: Week 6
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: A fun mixed-bag of streams. Started the week with an art stream where I worked on a banner that would eventually also be turned into a new profile picture. Played only four games this week instead of five! Yay for embeds! Went back to FANTASIAN and other faves!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: Week 5
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: I streamed all seven days this week‚Ä¶I don't think I'm going to do that again üòÖ
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: Week 4
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Busy week is just about over! My first week streaming almost every day is almost over! I'm not sure I'm going to do another week like this, it was a lot, but I now I can do it!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: New Template
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: As I work on various art assets, like stream overlays, frames, cards, and my vTubing model, I have settled on a kind of brand for myself that revolves around a few colors. While I love this site, its design, and the various color schemes available for it, I wonder if it will serve this kind of "brand" that I am building for myself on Twitch. I'm thinking it would be best to make this site an extension of the brand.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: Week 3
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: I've begun to ramp up my stream schedule just a bit so there are some were a few more streams this week than there had been in the last two weeks. As I mentioned, though, last week had two art streams, but I'll be putting the second one as the first for this week. Hope that's not too confusing. We also had a few game streams including my first throwback thursday!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: Week 2
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Quite a lot happened in my second week of streaming. I started the week with two art streams! Also a few things that happened since last week's recap, were a total of three game streams including a suprise stream testing Persona 3 Reload!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Working on P3!
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description:
In my Stream Recap for this week you won't find a Persona 3 stream, but I did have one. It was a surprise stream and you can catch it on my Twitch page. I'll also be in next week's recap, probably. Anyway, I also worked a bit on the Persona 3 Reload Walkthrough this week.

The Stream Recap!

You can see it my link! I have decided how I will handle news and stream schedules! There will be essentially two tags "news" and "recap" but you don't have to know that unless you're looking specifically for streaming news versus regular news. You can also just look at the tag "stream" for everything to do with streams.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Stream Recap: Week 1
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description:
Art Stream

If you want to see my first art stream, you can catch it in last week's news article! This week though, I started simple again by designing a template to use for schedule images and then put it to the test by creating this week's schedule! I think I'm getting used to making art on stream. Not very many people watch the stream so maybe that has something to do with it, but I'm not sure. I guess the only way to know is to see how I am with more viewers üòÖ I still had fun though. You'll be able to catch it on YouTube.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Am a Streamer Now
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: If you've been around my site for awhile than you probably know that I am an artist and a writer. Well, I haven't really been doing much writing of late, other than school papers, but I'm still a writer, okay? Well, anyway, I have a new hat! A streamer hat!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Still Haven't Broken It
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: I know last week's new article sounded a little bleak and I even told you not to expect weekly updates any more, but, well here I am! I wanted to give myself a bit of an "out" because of how I was feeling. I'm still not feeling great, but I'm here and I am working on updates. Unfortunately, the one you will see will look like a removal of something and not updating or adding anything. Don't worry, it will be back later and in greater numbers üòÜ
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: A Case of the "Mehs"
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Do you ever just have times in your life, or maybe just a day or a few hours, where you just don't want to do anything? Like no matter what it is you are doing, even if its something that usually brings you a lot of joy or something you're normally really passionate about, you just can't seem to enjoy doing it. I'd honestly like to know if I'm the only one üòÖ Well this has happened a few days this week and rather than coming up with something to update the site with, I decided I'd talk about this a little and the struggle with this one is so real for me.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Moar Persona News
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: After finishing the easiest S-Link guide ever, I have to admit I have not really gone back üòÖ I have mostly been playing through Persona3 Reload and P3P. Of course I still have work to do. Fortunately, it seems that the amount of work as decreased a bit since I am more used to the new processes. I also am still working on some stories and ADVENTURES, but most of that work isn't seen until I'm ready to release it üòÖ
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: New Quarter More Work
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: I think they underworked me last quarter and now this quarter they decided to overwork me üòÜ I'm kidding though, but only a little. I do have a lot more work to do this quarter each work than I did last quarter, but its not a terrible amount. I am hoping it gives me a little bit more hours and more money though. I'll find this out on my next pay check.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Spring Break Over
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Forgive me for not having much to update this week. We did have a little fun with April Fool's Day this year and that's good enough for me, but I need to put out a bit of an update to see if I can clear that and I do have a few things to talk about so I figured I'd put out a small news article this week and focus on getting my work and shtuff ready for the next quarter.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Social Links (er...I mean Social Networking)
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description:
Working on my Persona guides, especially the Persona 4 Golden Social Link guides and working on my own professional development at the same time has got me thinking a little bit about the subject of building Social Networks. I'm not talking about Facebook, or Twitter, or even Mastodon, I'm talking about the relationships we build with each other over time much like the protagonists in a Persona game.

Progress!

Before I go into that topic though I just wanted to let everyone know that I am making progress on transcribing my DnD adventures into Keyrie's Journal. I wasn't really aware of how much we actually manage to do per session even if it seems like the sessions just fly by üòÖ So this is a bit more of an undertaking than I originally thought it would be. I think it'll be worth it in the end even if I still only have the first chapter available right now.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Where Do Breaks Go
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Okay maybe that's not really that fair of a question, especially considering spring break literally just started, but, hey, it's already Thursday! I mean come on I only get three weeks so what's up with that!? I always come up with all sorts of things that I want to do accomplish during my breaks. Things that I don't think I would have time to work on while I'm in class. However, its already Thursday of the first week and I haven't really made much of a dent. That said, there are still quite a few things I have worked on this week!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Persona 4 Golden
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Persona 4 Golden is a faithful update to a classic game with new story elements and new characters. It has a classic story with interesting characters. The protagonist is a bit generic and the graphics are a little dated, but the story and gameplay more than make up for these minor gripes. If you like a game with a lot of charm and fun, I highly recommend Persona 4 Golden!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Bring on P3 Reload!
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Well, I had finished the main story of Persona 4 Golden. I have even managed to get the walkthrough down a bit and I think it fits okay in on part now, so I went and removed the second part. I also have started some work on the other guide sections. Mostly just got Marie up. So yeah I feel accomplished! After finishing P4G, I started P3P, but, before I even started writing this, I managed to get my hands on P3 Reload! So I went ahead and started that too!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Teddie (Star)
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description:
I won't give too much information about Teddie. Teddie is Teddie and Teddie is a party member and persona-user, somehow. You'll automatically start and rank this social link during the story.

Availability

Depending on how you look at it Teddie is not really ever available. You don't get the option to hang out with him outside of story events and other S-Links. This isn't a bad thing because it is actually one of the easiest S-Links to rank as it happens automatically during normal story events.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Rise (Lovers)
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description:
Rise is idol named "Rise-chi (or Risette if you're a barbarian)" who may have suffered from a bit of burnout and is now seeking a break from that work and a quieter life back in her home town.

Availability

You'll start this Social Link automatically 7/23 after you complete the Marukyu Striptease dungeon. You'll usually find her on the first floor of the high school or in front of the tofu shop in the central shopping district on the days listed below.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi
